Uses of Language in org.restlet.representation
 

Methods in org.restlet.representation that return types with arguments of type Language
 List<Language> Variant.getLanguages()
          Returns the modifiable list of languages.
 

Method parameters in org.restlet.representation with type arguments of type Language
 void Variant.setLanguages(List<Language> languages)
          Sets the list of languages.

Note that when used with HTTP connectors, this property maps to the "Content-Language" header.
